content: decrease 16 18 20 double_crochet decrease 1dc in next st place green row 1 ws 1dc in 2nd chain from hook 1dc in each chain to end maker in last st made decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts before red turn 10 sts marker decrease 1dc in st with red marker 38 42 46 sts row 2 rs 1ch does not count as a st here and throughout round 2 1dc in each st to end moving markers up as you work working in back loop of each st 1dc in each st to end turn round 3 decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts before green marker repeat row 2 another 38 42 46 times ending with the ws decrease 1dc in st with marker decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts facing for next row 40 44 48 row in total before red marker decrease 1dc in st with marker 34 38 42 sts seam cuff 1ch working in blo of each st slip_stitch across repeat rnds 2 3 another 3 4 5 times 22 sts first and last row of cuff to join do not fasten_off fasten_off leaving a tail of approximately 15cm using tapestry needle and the tail sew toes opening closed on ws leg afterthought heel rotate to work in row-ends of cuff working in row-ends 1ch work 42 46 50 double_crochet evenly with rs facing join yarn at the bottom right corner of the spaced around top edge of cuff slip_stitch to first st to join heel opening working along the sole work 25 27 29 double_crochet you may wish to place a marker to denote the beginning evenly spaced place red marker in last st made working of round you do not have to move it up as you work along the other side of heel opening work 25 27 29 double_crochet evenly round 2 rs 1dc blo in each st to end spaced place green marker in last st made 50 54 58 sts round 2 sets double_crochet back loop pattern and is repeated round 1 decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts before the red marker decrease 1dc in st with marker decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts rnds 3 5 work in patt before green marker decrease 1dc in st with marker round 6 increase 2dc blo in next st 20 22 24 double_crochet blo twice 46 50 54 sts 44 48 52 sts round 2 1dc in each st to end moving markers up as you work rnds 7 12 work in patt round 3 decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts before the red marker round 13 increase 2dc in next st double_crochet blo in next 21 23 25 sts twice decrease 1dc in st with marker decrease 1dc in each st to 2 sts 46 50 54 sts before green marker decrease 1dc in st with marker rnds 14 21 work in patt 42 46 50 sts repeat rnds
